X-Shopper-Id.description: Shopper for whom domain contacts are to be updated. NOTE: This is only required if you are a Reseller managing a domain purchased outside the scope of your reseller account. For instance, if you're a Reseller, but purchased a Domain via http://www.godaddy.com

domain.description: Domain whose Contacts are to be updated.

body.description: Changes to apply to existing Contacts
